snippet: Identifying songs in just a few seconds made Shazam famous, and now it has introduced a music player; Pandora reaches a registered-user milestone; and more.
abstract: Identifying songs in just a few seconds made Shazam famous, and now it has introduced a music player; Pandora reaches a registered-user milestone; and more.
lead_paragraph: Daily updates on the business of digital music:

headline.main: Digital Notes: Shazam Tries to Do More, and Pandora Hits 125 Million
